meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7912.

td.p: Julie Bender, a public transportation consultant from Philadelphia, Pennsylvania
Haley Zapal, a copywriter from Atlanta, Georgia
John Presloid, a microbiologist from Perrysburg, Ohio (whose 4-day cash winnings total $92,200)

tr.td: EVERYONE INTO THE POOL!
U.S. GEOGRAPHY
TAKING STOCK
LIT-POURRI
NEVER GONNA GIVE U UP
(Alex: Each correct response will contain two U's. In fact, that's the only vowel in each correct response.)
RICK ROLES
(Alex: I have no idea what that one's about.)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: I can\'t recall an occasion when all three of our players wrote down their responses so quickly. I timed you. It was about 12 seconds!)
JulieWho are Calvin + Hobbes
$0
JohnWho are Calvin and Hobbes? :)
$1,000
HaleyWho are Calvin + Hobbes?
$13,000
Calvin & Hobbes')

tr.td: COMIC STRIP TITLE CHARACTERS
These 2 were named for a European "theologian who believed in predestination" & a "philosopher with a dim view of human nature"
John
Haley
Julie
2nd place: $2,000
New champion: $27,400
3rd place: $1,000
John
Haley
Julie

(including 1 DD),

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
